thread.title: Syrian Hospitals Hit by Russian Airstrikes, Says Medical Group
thread.title_full: Syrian Hospitals Hit by Russian Airstrikes, Says Medical Group - WSJ

author: Raja Abdulrahim
title: Syrian Hospitals Hit by Russian Airstrikes, Says Medical Group
text:
BEIRUTâ€”Russian airstrikes struck nine hospitals in Syria this month, a medical aid group said, killing and injuring tens of staff and civilians.
At least 12 people were killed and 28 injured when a hospital in the northwest province of Idlib was struck twice by air-to-surface missiles on Tuesday, according to the Syrian American Medical Society, which operates the hospital and dozens of other medical facilities throughout...
